“第三季度，汉高延续了之前几个季度的良好势头，业绩再创新高。调整后息税前利润率首次达到 13%，”汉高管理委员会主席罗思德先生表示：“这里我要特别强调一点：虽然业务环境困难重重，但所有地区和业务部门都对汉高第三季度的成功有所贡献。强势品牌和成功创新再次成为促进汉高业绩增长的原动力。同时，改进成本结构以及落实战略重点这两项措施也功不可没。” 对于2010财年的整体情况，罗思德先生表示：“我们预计，2010 年调整后息税前利润率将远高于 12.0%，调整后优先股每股收益增长将超过 45%。2010 年很可能会成为汉高史上业绩最出众的一年，这使我们朝着 2012 年财务目标又迈进了重要的一步。”j# TLkUF $s?=t)}

2010 年第三季度，汉高销售额达 39.61 亿欧元。由于市场整体环境较为有利，销售额同比劲增 13.7%。除去汇率及并购/剥离影响，销售额增长达 6.4%。同比有机增长，即除去汇率及并购/剥离影响，高达 6.5%。公司所有业务部门均对此有所贡献。继 2010 年二季度有机销售增长速度稍缓之后，本季度洗涤剂及家用护理业务部增速达到 3.4%。化妆品/美容用品业务部有机增长再次远超市场平均水平，同比有机增幅达 4.6%。受量价齐升拉动，粘合剂技术业务部实现两位数的同比增长，达到 9.7%。q U\hTVRL,`G?=fw8U

得益于息税前利润的增长，三季度净收益从 1.8 亿欧元增长到 3.43 亿欧元，增幅为 90.6%。扣除总额为 600 万欧元的非控股收益后，三季度净收益为 3.37 亿欧元（去年三季度：1.72 亿欧元）。扣除非控股收益后调整后季度净收益达 3.49 亿欧元（去年同期为 2.56 亿欧元）。优先股每股收益 (EPS) 实现翻番，从每股 0.39 欧元增长到 0.78 欧元。调整后优先股每股收益为 0.80 欧元（去年同期：0.59 欧元）。_KaE# MW^?Q(E~;~

2010 财年的前九个月，由于市场不断扩张，汉高销售额增至113.63亿欧元，同比增长11.1%。除去汇率及并购/剥离影响，销售额增长达 6.6%。销售额有机增长达 7.3%，远高于去年同期水平。营运利润（息税前利润）从去年同期的 7.87 亿欧元增长到 13.44 亿欧元，增幅达 70.9%。这主要得益于粘合剂技术业务部逐渐摆脱 2009 年上半年金融危机影响，业绩大幅上升。扣除重组成本费用（1.04 亿欧元）、一次性费用（900 万欧元）和一次性收益（4300 万欧元）和，调整后营运利润从 9.5 亿欧元增至 14.14 亿欧元，增幅 48.8%。销售回报率（息税前利润率）也从去年同期的 7.7% 猛增至 11.8%。调整后的销售回报率从 9.3% 增至 12.4%， bAkLno0V{@h=- {:

第三季度，洗涤剂及家用护理业务部销售额增长 8.4%，为 11.23 亿欧元。其中汇率变动贡献为 5.4%。所有相关市场中价格战、促销力度继续加大，使产品价格较去年同期下跌 5.6%。不过，由于销售量猛增 9.0%，有机销售额同比增长 3.4%。非洲/中东区是推动销售额有机增长的主要动力之一，其增幅达到两位数。受德国业绩拉动，西欧区销售额也出现大幅增长。而北美区则因为竞争压力增大，销售额略有下滑。在其它地区，洗涤剂及家用护理业务部销售额基本维持去年同期水平，市场份额有所增加。运营利润增长 1.4%，至 1.39 亿欧元。去年三季度，受价格走高、原材料价格下调拉动，销售回报率保持在较高水平；今年三季度调整后销售回报率为 13.6%，略低于去年同期水平。但与二季度相比，尽管面临原材料价格继续上涨、售价持续下滑的压力，三季度的调整后销售回报率依然出现了 1% 的增长。在洗涤剂业务方面，重垢型洗涤剂成为推动部门盈利增长的主力，宝莹产品表现尤为出色。Weisser Riese 品牌产品也毫不逊色，特别是具备活性着色能力的 Intensive Color 粉末和凝胶产品。织物柔顺剂在创新技术的支持下延续了良好的发展势头。例如，汉高在西欧区推出了含新型清香颗粒的 Vernel 品牌产品，将保护功能与长效留香合二为一。受餐具洗涤产品业绩拉动，家用护理业务有机销售额连续增长。在机用洗涤剂方面，Somat 9 和 Somat Perfect Gel 对业绩增长贡献尤大。汉高手工洗碗产品的增长速度也十分令人鼓舞。提供了四种活性成分的全新洁厕产品成功上市，进一步推动了业绩增长。E8VQ?UBt5~6AC- S
A3BEX! |7As1M,0
化妆品/美容用品业务部延续了上一季度销售额与利润的强劲增长势头。销售额有机增长 4.6%，至 8.45 亿欧元，在去年同期的优异成绩上更进一步。化妆品/美容用品业务部增速再次超过相关市场平均水平，成熟市场和新兴市场都交上了一份令人满意的答卷。西欧区继续稳定增长，北美区维持平稳势头。亚洲（不包括日本）、非洲/中东、拉美和东欧等高增长地区略高于市场平均水平，有机销售额增长率都达到了两位数。运营利润增长 13.4%，至 1.13 亿欧元，除去汇率影响，增长率达 7.3%。因此，本季度销售回报率也相应增长至 13.4%，较去年同期高出 0.4%。扣除重组成本费用和一次性收益，化妆品/美容用品业务部调整后营运利润率再创新高，达到 13.6%，同比增长 0.6%。美发用品业务领域持续向好，市场份额不断攀升，所有产品类别销售额均创下历史最高纪录。除 Schauma Silk Comb 系列成功上市外，Gliss Kur Oil Nutritive 的重新推出也成为本季度美发用品业务的重头戏之一。在染发产品业务中， Syoss Color 系列继续大展拳脚，第一款长效泡沫染发剂 Perfect Mousse 也成功推出。在造型产品业务中，Taft 系列的重新上市及其全新子系列 Taft Ultra with Argon Oil 为该部门的业绩增长贡献良多。三季度，身体护理业务核心品牌创新攻势丝毫不减。新型高性能男士用除体味品牌 Right Guard 先后在西欧和东欧地区推出，在竞争激烈的市场环境中站稳了脚跟。同时，Fa 也新推出了 Mystic Moments 系列产品。由于 Right Guard Total Defense 5 成功上市，北美区市场份额显著提高。在皮肤护理方面，随着 Diadermine 副品牌 Novagen 的推出，进一步巩固了 Diadermine 在抗衰老领域的市场地位。在口腔护理方面，已取得成功的 Theramed 2合1系列再度荣登市场，带来全新 Power Clean & White 产品。在美发沙龙方面，受跨领域品牌 Essensity 重新上市所带来的影响，三季度销售额也延续了增长势头。虽然市场环境一直较为不利，但该业务部门仍巩固了自己的市场地位，市场份额持续增长。|F-R2vu0):"vKqF
M%eUoxl|=N@C$
第三季度，粘合剂技术业务部业绩继续增长。与遭受金融危机重创的去年同期相比，今年三季度销售额大增 19.3%，达到 19.45 亿欧元，各地区均超过当地平均增长速度。有机销售额增长率达 9.7%。在价格涨幅不大的条件下，粘合剂技术业务部的优异业绩以及市场份额的提升主要来自于销量的增长。该部门旗下所有业务和地区均表现出色。亚洲（除日本外）、非洲/中东、拉美和东欧等新兴地区的销售增长幅度都超过了当地平均水准，整体有机增长达到 2 位数。西欧、北美等成熟市场的销售额也出现大幅增长。与去年同期相比，运营利润翻了两番，达到创纪录的2.68亿欧元。调整后的销售回报率实际增长8.3%，达到13.8%的历史新高。尤其值得一提的是，这一成绩是在本季度原材料、包装价格持续走高，影响远超去年同期的背景下取得的。工匠、消费者和建筑用粘合剂业务在全球所有地区发展势头良好。工匠用粘合剂、消费者用粘合剂和建筑用粘合剂业务对此均有贡献。拉美和东欧地区的销售额均出现同比大幅增长。运输及金属业务势头不减。特别是在亚太、拉美和东欧地区，销售额都远超去年同期水平。北美、欧洲/非洲/中东均达到了两位数的增幅。通用工业业务的成绩也相当令人鼓舞。销售额增长幅度达到前所未有的幅度，所有地区均对此有所贡献，部分地区的增长甚至达到了两位数。包装、消费品、建筑粘合剂业务也继续同比增长，亚太、拉美和西欧增长速度最快。由于半导体行业强劲复苏，电子产品业务继续大幅提升。所有地区均与有力焉，欧洲和北美表现尤为出众。Bo*l*Y&g%8I1?}eAi

汉高相信其在有机销售额增长方面定能再次超越其所处市场。其在经营方面已采取多项措施，汉高希望通过这些措施，推动其进一步发展。例如，该公司预计在国民淀粉业务整合产生的协同效应及严格的成本管理方面得益，从而增加收益。所有这些因素以及销售额的增长都将汉高业绩产生积极影响。汉高预计调整后的息税前利润率较2009年增长远超12%; 调整后优先股每股收益较 2009 年增长45%。4 W_/@_1Uv-1u

description.hltext_display: Therese Rein stuck in snowy London
description.content:
Foreign Minister Kevin Rudd's wife Therese Rein is one of thousands of stranded commuters held up by icy conditions in London and at risk of missing Christmas at home.
Mr Rudd said his wife was expected home on Thursday but with flights cancelled after big snowfalls in England's capital forcing flight cancellations, she is trying to find an alternative way home.
Asked by reporters in Sydney why she was stuck in London, the foreign minister replied: "Snow, it's the white stuff, comes out of the sky, goes phoom like that".
But, Mr Rudd said, her presents would be under the tree when she did return."So, I've told her we're just going to defer Christmas in case she doesn't make it," he said."We'll make sure that her Santa stocking is preserved.
"But for all those Australians who are stuck at the moment, either trying to get there or trying to get out, it's a tough and rough time at the moment.
"And so, hopefully, the weather will clear and, hopefully, we can get people home soon, including Therese."
Cancellations have stranded thousands of travellers, affecting flights internationally - and the big freeze is tipped to continue.

description.hltext_display: Selling or closing your business
description.content:
If you are planning to sell your business you will need to present it in the best possible light. To obtain the most favourable outcome you need to consider several key areas:
Planning the sale
Finding a buyer
Legal representation
To maximise your benefits and reduce any future risk it is important to plan well. Your plan should include:
The transaction price
Current valuation of the business
Exit strategy
Identifying potential buyers
Profit and loss statements
Your plan should also include tax requirements, leases and rentals and the closing of accounts with suppliers and customers. If you are registered for VAT, HM Revenue and Customs need to be informed. It is crucial that your tax records are up to date at the time of sale as the buyer’s solicitors and accountants will need to carry our due diligence checks.
Our Commercial Team are specialised in business sales and can advise you on any legal issues that may arise. Head of the Team, Matthew Fretten, says "If you are selling a registered company or a limited liability partnership (LLP) and this results in changes to the company secretary or directors, or the LLP’s members, you must inform Companies House. Under business transfer legislation you have certain legal responsibilities to your employees, including redundancy payments and changes to any pension schemes. Our expert team can guide you through all of these obligations - please get in touch if you would like a free initial meeting to discuss your options."
If you are selling a registered company or a limited liability partnership (LLP), under business transfer legislation, you have certain legal responsibilities to your employees. Our expert team can guide you through all of these obligations - please get in touch if you would like a free initial meeting to discuss your options.
Partner - Commercial

友达光电智权长罗方祯博士荣获国际电机电子工程师学会（IEEE）(*)所颁发的“2011西泽润一奖（Jun-ichi Nishizawa Medal）”，长期致力于TFT-LCD发展的投入和贡献再获肯定。IEEE订于2011年8月于美国旧金山办理颁奖典礼，正式表扬得奖者的学术贡献及卓越成就。"^rp3(j4_"q3*&

IEEE为全球最大的电子电机学会，现有全球160国近四十万名会员。“西泽润一奖”为其纪念日本西泽润一博士所设立之奖项。西泽博士在国际半导体领域享誉盛名，素有日本“半导体先生”及“光通信之父”的美誉，故IEEE于2002年设立“西泽润一奖”以纪念其终身成就。该奖项在国际间占有举足轻重的地位，评选过程极为严谨，包括原创技术质量、研发投入、论文及专利质量、获奖纪录，以至于对学界、业界及社会的贡献程度等项目，均列入考虑范围。本次获此殊荣的得奖者亦包括曾任职于美国西屋电气公司、同为世界TFT-LCD开发先驱的Dr. Peter Brody，以及早期于美国无线电公司（RCA）发明矩阵设计的Dr. Bernard Lechner。I1"R|cV|&z?u~4xp

罗博士自美国西北大学博士研究开始投入TFT领域，四十年来始终专注于TFT的研发、引领创新，为全球TFT产业发展史写下多项辉煌纪录。罗博士分别于1973及1974年在西屋电气开发出世界首片TFT-EL及TFT-LCD面板，1974年12月因此被美国时代（TIME）杂志报导，在全球工业界造成轰动。罗博士亦为将TFT-LCD显示器应用在航空器之世界先驱。在美国GE、OIS服务期间，成功开发军用TFT-LCD显示器，将 TFT-LCD面板导入F16战斗机、Apache直升机、NASA宇宙飞船，及波音和空中巴士机舱等，使TFT-LCD成功取代CRT。w8UdBlY)k*NCjq?

罗博士对促进台湾TFT-LCD产业的交流发展，也一向不遗余力。2002年台湾TFT-LCD产业协会（TTLA）成立后，罗博士便主持TTLA前瞻研发联盟业界科专计划，由此整合业界资源力量，大幅提升台湾TFT-LCD产业的全球竞争力。自1996年起担任友达技术长，并于2010年10月起担任智权长（CIPO, Chief Intellectual Property Officer），率领团队研发各式创新技术，并致力于智慧财产之管理与提升，及专利地图的布建。凭借着充沛的研发能量，友达迅速晋升成为全球领先的TFT-LCD供应商，拥有的专利数目持续傲视同业，并屡获得国内外发明创作相关奖项肯定。8N `?{! description.hltext_display: 部分民营医院内刊充斥“黄毒”
description.content:
来源：法制日报┊4933字节┊阅读：39次┊2010-12-22
熙熙攘攘的商场前面,有人塞给你一本时尚杂志,很多人有种天上掉馅饼的感觉,就顺手放进包里,想回家后慢慢欣赏。原来,这本免费杂志是一本民营医院的内刊,里边除了该医院的广告,更多的是露骨的情爱描写和画面……这是很多人在人流密集区经常遇到的情形。
记者在山东省青岛市调查发现,这些没有刊号、没有工商广告审批、充满色情暴力、涉嫌侵权的杂志,充斥于青岛的人流密集区,杂志散发人员甚至连中小学生都不放过,危害严重。这些“杂志”为逃避有关人员监管,经常打一枪换一个地方,成了“黄毒游击队”,给监管带来巨大挑战。
“医院内刊”充斥商圈
今天下午,记者在青岛台东商业步行街转悠,一散发杂志的年轻小伙子发给记者一本杂志。记者发现,这本名叫《岛城领袖》的杂志是一本医院内刊,属于贺年版,封面上,一名美女明星向读者抱拳拜年,封底是2011年的日历,可能是感觉日历有点价值,很多被赠予杂志的群众都随手把杂志放进包内带走。
台东步行街是国内排名前几位的名街,人流量巨大,记者采访台东闹市区一些报刊亭主、商贩,他们都称这个地方散发医院内刊的人特别多,几乎每天都有几十拨。
青岛中豪外国语学校的赵小姐是个很爱看杂志的女士,她一下子给记者拿出来好几本这样的内刊:《小城大爱》、《广济:读者文摘》、《真爱》。“我几乎每周都能发现新的内刊在我单位附近发放。”她称。
更有意思的是,记者在台东六路和威海路交界处的台东一隅发现,有个老年人正在从垃圾箱里往外捡纸张好当废纸卖,记者发现,在老大爷身边半米多高的纸张里,内刊占据了一多半。“这个老头每天光从垃圾箱里捡医院内刊就能卖个几十元。”旁边的一位糖果摊主告诉记者。
杂志“色狼之意不在色”
“太露骨了。”这是很多医院内刊读者对这些内刊的评价。
记者发现,这些内刊的封面都很精美,一个年轻貌美的女明星在封面上朝你微笑,感觉非常养眼。然而,打开杂志,原本还算雅致的装帧完全被不堪入目的低俗文章和广告所充斥,诸如《对男人最有效的内裤勾引法》、《一年性爱帮你赚10万广告费》等打着擦边球的情色文学比比皆是,里边的幽默笑话也几乎全是黄段子。在这些露骨的故事间隙,穿插着该医院的特色专科、联系方式以及该医院相对其他医院价目的优惠对比。
除了情色路线,还有的内刊走秘闻路子。在青岛某医院主办的《真爱》一期杂志里,记者发现,《辛亥革命后,国民党“有为青年”多逛妓院》、《林彪遗骸为何未能回国》、《冯小刚鲜为人知的婚姻内幕》等文章充斥其中。当然,杂志中也不忘穿插一些关于“性”的内容。
“这些杂志之所以刊登这些与医疗保健毫无干系的内容,就是为了吸引你阅读,让你去他们医院就诊,醉翁之意不在酒啊。”对这些内刊用意,很多读者都心知肚明。
无刊号和广告许可证
除了内容露骨之外,医院内刊还有很多地方令人诟病。
按照2005年9月20日由国家新闻出版总署颁布的《期刊出版管理规定》,“内部发行的期刊只能在境内按指定范围发行,不得在社会上公开发行、陈列。”同样,在此前(1997年12月30日)新闻出版总署颁布的《内部资料性出版物管理办法》中,更是明确规定,“对内部资料性出版物的委印和承印,实行核发《内部资料性出版物准印证》管理。未经批准取得《准印证》,任何单位和个人不得从事内部资料性出版物的委印和承印活动。”；《内部资料性出版物管理办法》第五条同时规定:“印刷时,应在明显位置完整地印出‘内部资料准印证’编号,不得省略或假冒、伪造。”对于刊登广告的问题,则有第六条做出这样的规定:“内部资料性出版物严格限定在本系统、本行业、本单位内部交流,不得收取任何费用,不得刊登广告,不得拉赞助或搞有偿经营性活动。”
但是,记者手头掌握的几种医院内刊却统统没有刊号和广告经营许可证,明显违反新闻出版相关法规和广告法。
并且,很多医院内刊都是用明星做封面。但记者了解到,这些医院都没有跟明星签订广告合同,涉嫌侵犯明星权益。“内刊从正规报刊、互联网上摘录的内容,这些医院根本没有付转载费,都是偷偷摸摸进行的。”一医院人士告诉记者。
危言耸听误导患者
既然内刊乱象丛生,那内刊中的健康资讯是否真实可信呢?
记者将收集到的部分杂志拿到青岛市海慈医院,该院有关医师仔细阅读之后认为,这些杂志中宣传的所谓“健康知识”根本就是玩笑之作,要么危言耸听,要么胡说八道。“像包皮过长问题,将‘包皮过长’这种再普通不过的小问题与‘阴茎癌’、‘不孕不育’等极端个别病例相提并论,明显在吓唬人,诱导你去他们医院做手术。”
据介绍,此类杂志通常采用过度联想、虚构症状、夸大后果、杜撰专家、臆造术语等方式误导消费者。由于普通患者相关知识匮乏、碍于隐私不愿示人等原因,往往会上当受骗。记者了解到,这些内刊主要针对一些城乡接合部发放,对那些年龄偏大、知识匮乏的人群很有效,在青岛市香港中路白领聚集区等发放得很少。
受害的还有中小学生,青岛第44中学的小谢女生告诉记者,她们班经常有同学把这些杂志拿到学校中阅读,称是在街头别人发给他们的。“幼小的孩子阅读这些充斥情色、赤裸暴力的图片,将会给他们的心灵带来不同程度的毒害。”青岛市市北区一位心理学专家认为。
需五部门联手“除妖”
“当街乱发的医院内刊是一个新出现的问题,涉及到文化广电新闻、工商、医疗、城管、公安等部门,执法部门单独行动确实捉襟见肘。”山东科技大学的一位法学专家称,“比如,占道经营属于城管管辖,但人家医院称自己是‘发内部资料,不属于经营’,所以很难界定；比如,因为类似的医院都是民营小医院,被侵权的明星和文章原创人员一般也不会去法院告这些医院；到底内刊是否是传播黄色文化,也没有现成的经验可以借鉴,确实很难界定。”
“更棘手的是,这些民营医院,为逃避监管,经常打一枪换一个地方,安排分发杂志人员游走性分发,并且他们一般在人流密集区分发,所以很难被发现。”青岛文化出版部门的一位人员称,“取缔这些‘内部刊物’,还需要多个部门联手,权衡好各家部门的责权利,成立长效机制,比如借助城管的网络优势,借助卫生部门的行业主管优势等等,才能有效根除。”
“有关法律法规也需要进行细化,从源头上遏制这种内刊的乱象。”有关法律人士也建议。
（中华传媒网）

description.content:

玩家们对《迅游世界》第一次封闭测试一定还记忆犹新，现在正经历二测的《迅游世界》与一测时相比已经有了天翻地覆的变化！这是现在众多二测中的玩家们正实实在在体会着的游戏的进步！
玩家们一定也还记得一测时的那几个清新可人的迅游MM吧，这次《迅游世界》二测期间她们也来到了游戏当中体会湛蓝星球的魔幻美景，并且，作为《迅游世界》的忠实粉丝，她们还在《迅游世界》官方网站上发布一系列自己的私照，那可是美艳动人，摄人心魄哦！

description.hltext_display: 米高梅获融资 摆脱破产阴影
description.content:
来源：新京报┊800字节┊阅读：41次┊2010-12-22
美国老牌电影公司米高梅20日宣布，正式与望远镜电影公司合并，并获得5亿美元的融资，至此彻底告别了破产阴影。
米高梅当天声明，该公司已募集到５亿美元资金，准备以此摆脱破产保护和投拍新的影视作品。根据新重组方案，米高梅的新投资人是亿万富翁卡尔・伊坎，他将以入股的方式帮助米高梅偿还大约50亿美元的债务和利息。原米高梅的债权人将会在重组后的米高梅公司获得95%的股份。
作为米高梅主要投资方的望远镜娱乐公司合伙人加里・巴伯和罗杰・伯恩鲍姆从当天起将成为米高梅公司的联合主席和CEO，并将拥有新米高梅公司1%的股份，原米高梅CEO斯蒂芬・库伯正式“下岗”。
据悉，米高梅将把这5亿美元融资用于拍摄新片，包括投拍科幻片《机器战警》、007系列和被视为《指环王》前传的《霍比特人》系列影片。
创立８６年的米高梅近年来由于严重亏损，积欠了近50亿美元的债务及利息。本月初，纽约南区美国破产法院已批准了该公司提交的新重组方案。
（中华传媒网）

description.hltext_display: 三国杀online岁末答谢礼包温馨发布
description.author: zolgame
description.content:
冬天的脚步悄然而至，日历也在不觉间翻到了十二月。三国杀online在各位玩家的支持和关心中，走过了不平凡的2010年。
从年初网页版三国杀模式的贴心发布，到暑期档3v3模式的热火朝天，从可爱俏皮的三国秀风靡各大区，到尊贵的会员系统携手1v1模式华丽上演。在过去的十二个月中，三国杀online不断的前进着，完善着——而鼓舞着我们不断将三国杀online越做越好的动力，全来自于你们——热心的三国杀玩家们。
在这辞旧迎新之际，只言片语无法表达三国杀online项目组对广大玩家的感激之情，唯有精心准备一份岁末礼包，聊表心意——自2010年12月20日起至2011年1月3日，所有登录三国杀online的玩家均可以在游戏中领取到“三国杀online岁末答谢礼包”一份。礼包中不仅有超值非卖的三国秀装扮，还有极具人气的各类小道具哦！
先来小秀一下礼包中的非卖三国秀，俏皮可爱的圣诞版黄月英和背着大口袋cos圣诞老人的曹操——
三国杀online岁末答谢礼包领取攻略
第一步：登录三国杀online游戏（客户端与网页版均已开通领取！）
第二步：在游戏中打开礼包领取界面。
客户端版本礼包领取界面按钮位置——
网页版本礼包领取界面按钮位置——
第三步：轻松点击领取礼包。
只要点击领取，系统就会将礼包中的道具自动发放到你的包裹中，不需要输入任何激活码或其他文字哦！
客户端版本礼包领取界面——
网页版本礼包领取界面——
第四步：领取注意事项。
岁末答谢礼包是三国杀online游戏回馈给大家的一份小小礼物，礼包中包含了珍贵的非卖三国秀和N多人气道具，十分珍贵。因此每个盛大通行证仅可以领取一次。大家领取礼包的时候可一定要谨慎选择游戏大区哦，领错大区可就要“杯具”啦！
随着三国杀online岁末答谢礼包的推出，更多岁末狂欢活动也将陆续发布，不想错过更多精彩体验的话，记得密切关注我们的官方消息哦！

description.hltext_display: Kernel girls drop third consecutive
description.content:
YANKTON — From both a figurative and literal sense, the Yankton Gazelles rebounded in a big way. This time, it was as a ranked team.
(Jeremy Hoek/Press and Dakotan) Mitchell’s Macy Miller tries to drive around a Yankton defender during a game Tuesday in Yankton. Mitchell lost to the Gazelles 49-41.
YANKTON — From both a figurative and literal sense, the Yankton Gazelles rebounded in a big way.
This time, it was as a ranked team.
Keyed by a 45-24 edge in rebounds, the third-ranked Gazelles defeated Mitchell 49-41 in an Eastern South Dakota Conference girls’ basketball game Tuesday night.
All night, the Gazelles were able to get second — and sometimes third — chances on offensive rebounds.
According to Yankton coach Doug Pesicka, the extra time the Gazelles put in on rebounding during Monday’s practice seemed to work.
“We have a little drill we do that’s not a lot of fun,” Pesicka said. “We put a bubble on the basket so every shot’s a miss, and the girls have to get in there and fight for the ball.
“All that hard work definitely paid off.”
A continual problem for the Kernels (2-5) all night was missed looks at the rim, as at least 10 relatively simple shots rattled out. Adding to that, a 9-for-18 effort at the free-throw line didn’t help matters.
“For some reason, a lot of little easy looks just didn’t go down for us,” Mitchell coach Wes Morgan said. “You’ll have some nights like this, but we can’t have that and being out-played in the same night.”
After sitting out Saturday’s loss at Rapid City Stevens with the flu, Mitchell 6-foot sophomore forward Kerri Young led the Kernels with 16 points. She came in averaging 21.3 points in the three games she’s played this season.
Young drained a 3-pointer just 1:28 into the game to give the Kernels a 5-2 lead. But from there, the Gazelles took over.
Yankton’s Emily Anderson hit a long 3-pointer as the Gazelles took a 17-8 lead after the first quarter.
The Kernels made a quick rally to start the second quarter, cutting the deficit to 19-13 on a Young jumper in transition.
The Kernels put together a 6-0 run to pull within 23-19, but a pair of 3-pointers by Fedders brought the lead out to 29-21. After two Mitchell baskets, Yankton’s Buckman beat the halftime buzzer with a layup, giving Yankton a 31-25 cushion.
Rebounding was the area where the game was decided through the first two quarters, as Yankton led that stat 25-11. Included in that advantage were 12 offensive rebounds.
Yankton’s biggest lead of the game was at 40-29, when Anderson connected on a jumper. Mitchell closed the quarter with two straight baskets to close within 40-33 — yet Yankton was still in control.
A layup from Fedders began the scoring in the fourth quarter, and the teams traded baskets from there over the next four minutes.
Chloe Cornemann hit the second of two free throws to give Yankton a 47-37 lead with 2:33 to play. Up by eight with under two to play, the Gazelles got two offensive rebounds to run some time off the clock.
Riley Paulsen hit two free throws and Mitchell’s Kristin Sabers sank a layup with 16 seconds to play, and YHS ran out the clock from there.
It was another balanced night on offense for the Gazelles, who saw seven different players score. Cornemann added nine points despite getting in early foul trouble, Anderson added seven points and Buckman chipped in with six points.
Mitchell, losers of three straight after losing twice out in Rapid City last weekend, also got nine points and five assists from Macy Miller, as well as seven points from Sabers.
Even though Young led the Kernels with 16 points on 7-of-17 shooting, her coach said she’s still not completely healthy from the flu.
“She’s still not back at 100 percent,” Morgan said. “She made a pass there at the end that was like five feet behind her teammate. The Kerri Young we saw tonight isn’t what she can be. She’s a special player, so once we get some pieces back in place, we’ll be OK.”
Mitchell hosts Sioux Falls Lincoln Jan. 4 at the Corn Palace.
YANKTON 49, MITCHELL 41
YHS(4-1, 3-1)
Riley Paulsen 0-4 2-2 2; Heather Ray 1-4 0-0 2; Laura Buckman 3-6 0-0 6; Chloe Cornemann 3-6 3-4 9; Emily Fedders 5-17 4-4 17; Jenn Granflaten 0-0 0-0 0; Mikala Hora 3-5 0-0 6; Emily Anderson 3-10 0-0 7; Tory Gross 0-2 0-0 0; Rachael Johnson 0-1 0-4 0. TOTALS 18-55 9-14 49.
MHS (2-3, 2-1)
Charlee Nelson 0-3 0-0 0; Courtney Miller 0-2 0-0 0; Kerri Young 7-17 0-0 16; Kristin Sabers 3-11 1-3 7; Kelli Schlimgen 0-0 0-0 0; Macy Miller 2-5 5-8 9; Lexie Weier 2-2 1-2 5; Meghan Farnham 1-2 2-5 4. TOTALS 15-42 9-18 41.
MHS 8 25 33 41
YHS 17 31 40 49
Three-Pointers: YHS 4-11 (Fedders 3-7, Anderson 1-2, Cornemann 0-1, Hora 0-1), MHS 2-9 (Young 2-3, Sabers 0-1, C. Miller 0-2, Nelson 0-3). Total Rebounds: YHS 45 (Fedders 9), MHS 24 (Sabers 6). Assists: MHS 10 (M. Miller 5), YHS 9 (Fedders 4). Turnovers: YHS 17, MHS 17. Steals: YHS 12 (Hora 4), MHS 6 (Young 4).

description.hltext_display: 汉语出版物禁随意夹带外文 使用外文要进行注释
description.content:
来源：新京报┊1120字节┊阅读：43次┊2010-12-22
新闻出版总署日前下文要求，在汉语出版物中，禁止出现随意夹带使用英文单词或字母缩写等外国语言文字；禁止生造非中非外、含义不清的词语；禁止任意增减外文字母、颠倒词序等违反语言规范现象。
使用外文要进行注释
随着经济社会的发展，出现了在汉语言中随意夹杂英语等外来语、直接使用英文单词或字母缩写、生造一些非中非外、含义不清的词语等滥用语言文字的问题，严重损害了汉语言文字的规范性和纯洁性，破坏了和谐健康的语言文化环境，造成了不良的社会影响。
总署要求，汉语文出版物中需要使用外国语言文字的，应当用国家通用语言文字做必要的注释。外国语言文字的翻译应当符合翻译的基本原则和惯例。外国人名、地名等专有名词和科学技术术语要按有关规定翻译成国家通用语言文字。
总署称，此举旨在要求出版媒体和出版单位进一步加强外国语言文字的使用规范化，尊重并遵循汉语言及所使用的外国语言文字的结构规律和词汇、语法规则。
将审读外文使用情况
总署还要求有关单位严格执行规范使用汉语言文字有关规定，坚决抵制不良文化倾向，正确使用汉语言文字。
按照部署，各级新闻出版行政部门要将出版物使用语言文字情况，尤其是使用外语规范情况作为出版物质量检查和年度核验的重要内容，并将其纳入日常审读范围。对违反使用语言文字规范的，要责令改正，依法予以行政处罚。
（中华传媒网）

description.hltext_display: Kernels rebound way to win over Yankton
description.content:
The second-ranked Mitchell High School boys’ basketball team had a large size advantage Tuesday night against Yankton. And the Kernels used every bit of it.
(Travis Mester/Republic) Mitchell’s Ryan Yackley, left, goes for a rebound over Yankton’s Tyler Sternhagen during the first half of a game Tuesday at the Corn Palace.
The second-ranked Mitchell High School boys’ basketball team had a large size advantage Tuesday night against Yankton.
And the Kernels used every bit of it.
Mitchell dominated the Bucks in the rebounding department on their way to a 57-39 win in an Eastern South Dakota Conference game at the Corn Palace.
“Size, strength and athleticism, we were out-done in those categories,” Yankton coach Randy Gross said. “Mitchell is ranked second in the state, and there is a reason why. They hit the boards hard.”
The Kernels (5-0 overall, 3-0 ESD) outrebounded Yankton 38-12 and had 15 offensive rebounds.
Junior Tucker Volesky led Mitchell with 19 points, while fellow-junior Jade Miller had 11 points and seven rebounds. Senior Nick Young chipped in nine points, five rebounds and a team-high four assists for the Kernels, who went on a 16-4 run to end the third quarter and put the game away.
“It was just a good effort by all our kids,” Mitchell coach Gary Munsen said. “Once we got going, our defense picked up, and we really crashed the boards offensively and defensively.”
The Kernels led by three after the first quarter, which Yankton used a half-court zone defense to slow the action. Mitchell pushed the lead to 13 by halftime and was never in any danger.
“When you give up 15 offensive boards, you’re in trouble against anybody,” Gross said. “But there were a few things we didn’t do very well, and one of them was shooting the ball.”
Yankton was 6-for-21 shooting (28 percent) in the first half and did not have a player score more than seven points all game. Dylan Tacke led the Bucks with seven and Cole Drotzmann added six points and four rebounds.
Yankton (1-4, 1-3) is at Aberdeen on Jan. 7.
Mitchell faces DeLaSalle (Minn.) as part of the Mike Miller Foundation Classic at approximately 8 p.m. Dec. 30 at the Corn Palace.
Mitchell 57, Yankton 39

description.hltext_display: 影迷“被广告” 律师称到点不放电影属影院违约
description.content:
来源：北京晨报┊1564字节┊阅读：42次┊2010-12-22
“电影前的广告越来越长，买票时说6点开始，你6点15分进去绝对晚不了，还在播放广告呐。”电影爱好者秦先生发现，最近在电影院看的几部贺岁片都不能正点开始，片子前面加10分钟广告算是正常，更多的则达到了20分钟甚至40分钟。
据秦先生讲，上周日他在王府井新东安影城观看《让子弹飞》，买的票上标明6点开始，由于中间有事情耽误了一会儿，6点钟才往电影院门口走，“我当时觉得要迟到了，应该看不到开头了。”但当他走进电影院后发现，大屏幕上播放着广告，并没有正点开始。10分钟过后，又开始播放其他电影的预告片，直到6点25分左右，《让子弹飞》的片头才缓缓出现在屏幕上。“太过分了，我最多能接受10分钟广告时间，这还不像家里电视广告时间可以换台。”
无独有偶，记者随后采访了几位市民，大家普遍反映，最近在看贺岁片时，前面广告都比较长。市民林女士反映，她前几天在五棵松耀莱国际影城看电影时，前面的广告长达30分钟，最后在坐的观众都起哄了，还是没有减少时间。“这算好的，再早的时候单位组织看《狄仁杰通天帝国》，在万达影城看的，广告居然长达40分钟，幸亏大家都是买了晚餐进去的，要不然得饿死了。”
大家普遍表示，可以接受电影之前播放广告，但是广告时间不宜过长，一般在5至10分钟之内都比较合理，如果超过了这个时间，还是有些忍受不了，在这段时间内无法干别的，又不能离开，因为不知道影片什么时候开始。很少有影院能够按照公布的开始时间开始播放正片。
■律师说法
到点不放电影属影院违约
就此事记者采访了王丰昌律师，王律师表示，从严格意义上讲，如果在电影票上约定的开始时间时，电影并没有开始，那么电影院就已经违约，消费者可以通过两种渠道维护自己的权利，一种是要求电影院退票，另外一种就是投诉。“大家不是花钱看广告来的，如果是约定时间之前，电影院是可以播放广告的，但是约定时间一到就必须要播放正式的影片了。
（中华传媒网）

description.hltext_display: 盘点2010年韩国本土网游在线人数排名
description.author: zolgame
description.content:
韩国网络游戏市场异常发达，无数的韩国网游公司每年都向全球市场输出大量游戏作品。再经过了十几年的飞速发展之后，如今网络游戏行业已经成为了韩国经济的支柱产业之一，而韩国也一直处于世界网络游戏强国的前列。
韩国本土市场规模较小，而游戏作品的产出量却逐年增多，产品的供给超过了市场需求，在饱和的市场环境之下韩国游戏市场竞争之惨烈可见一般。由于可供选择的游戏实在太多，韩国玩家对于游戏品质的要求也越发苛刻，这样一来能在韩国本土站稳脚跟的游戏一定都是经过残酷市场选择优胜劣汰的精品游戏。那么在这么残酷的市场环境之下究竟是哪款游戏能够傲视群雄做到韩国第一的呢？
2010年最受韩国国内玩家欢迎的第一网游究竟是哪款游戏呢？答案既不是《魔兽世界》也不是《地下城与勇士》或者《永恒之塔》，真正的答案就是冒险岛2.0《大巨变》！
韩国权威媒体《朝鲜日报》公布的韩国本土网游排名
《朝鲜日报》游戏频道地址：Game.Chosun.com
在今年暑假之中《冒险岛》升级至2.0《大巨变》，一经推出就在韩国国内爆发出惊人能量，一举创造41.6万同时在线的韩国国内纪录，而这一纪录的诞生简直可以用“前无古人，后无来者”来形容。41.6万同时在线的运营成绩即使放在中国市场来说也算得上非常出色的在线人数，而这一盛况还是发生在市场竞争激烈且总人口不足五千万的韩国。
更让人咋舌的是41.6万同时在线的超级纪录并不是由一款新游戏所获得，冒险岛在韩国已经运营长达7年，这样一款长寿的游戏在如今依旧能爆发出这样的威力实在是让人感到非常震惊！那么究竟是什么力量让冒险岛又一次达到巅峰的呢？
这次的答案是变革！冒险岛2.0《大巨变》颠覆性的对冒险岛1.0的所有内容进行彻底改变，更加时尚的用户界面、与以往完全不一样的游戏地图、优秀的平衡性以及全新反抗者职业共同造就了冒险岛2.0《大巨变》的巨大成功。
韩国etnews网站最高同时在线排名
图片来源：http://www.etnews.co.kr/news/detail.html?id=201007260151
冒险岛2.0《大巨变》无疑是2010年韩国游戏市场的最大赢家，在新作频发的今天不但未被后来者超越，反而在《跑跑卡丁车》、《地下城与勇士》等热门大作的紧逼下脱颖而出，这都充分证明了这款游戏的出众实力。让我们衷心祝愿这款屡创奇迹的作品能在未来的时间里再度创造新的辉煌。

description.hltext_display: 赵本山宋丹丹有望再上春晚
description.content:
来源：新京报┊1951字节┊阅读：45次┊2010-12-22
有报道称据赵本山身边的工作人员透露，2011兔年春晚赵本山出演的小品已经有了眉目：赵本山倾向于一个新题材本子，名字叫《同桌的你》，演出搭档则有意选择曾与他在央视春晚有过五度合作的宋丹丹。昨日，记者就此事致电本山传媒总裁刘双平，他表示不清楚这个赵本山身边的工作人员是谁，对于不确定的事本山传媒不会做回应。宋丹丹的经纪人王小姐同样回复“不确定”。随后记者从知情人士处了解到，《同桌的你》确实是赵本山春晚小品三四部备选剧本中的一部。
赵本山明日或将参加春晚四审
据媒体报道，赵本山春晚小品剧本正在征集中，御用编剧尹琪曾透露“题材不一定局限在农村！”12月23日，春晚将进行语言类节目第四次审查。因为兔年春晚的审查极有可能减少到四次，之后就进行联排，所以赵本山有望参加春晚的四审。据赵本山身边一位工作人员透露，前不久，赵本山到海南度假，遇到了宋丹丹，但并非是一些媒体所报道的那样“邂逅了宋丹丹”，而是因为赵本山在海南的别墅与宋丹丹在海南的别墅毗邻。两人就春晚小品再次达成合作意向，白云和黑土将凑在一起唠起“同桌的你”，两人到底是共同回忆学生时代，还是重拾当年恋情续写新篇，只有等到审查或联排时才能揭晓。
《同桌的你》是备选剧本之一
昨日，记者就此事致电本山传媒总裁刘双平，他表示不回应不确定的事，并称不清楚这个赵本山身边的工作人员是谁。那么曾公开表示再也不上春晚的宋丹丹，是否会因《同桌的你》而食言？对此，宋丹丹的经纪人王小姐同样回复“不确定”。随后，记者从知情人士处了解到，《同桌的你》确实是赵本山春晚小品三四部备选剧本中的一部，但最终它能否登上春晚舞台，不到最后一刻都存在变数。
■ “山丹丹”春晚回眸
●1999年
小品《昨天、今天、明天》是赵本山与宋丹丹在春晚舞台上的首次合作。“山丹丹”合作模式一炮打响，“白云、黑土”成为赵本山小品经典角色不可或缺的一部分。
●2000年
两人趁热打铁，推出小品《钟点工》。
●2006年
小品《说事》伴随着宋丹丹的一句：“六年没见……”，“白云、黑土系列”再次走到观众面前。
●2007年
小品《策划》中牛群策划的白云、黑土家的公鸡下蛋的荒唐事没成功，但戏外“山丹丹”组合+“名嘴”的模式固定下来。
●2008年
小品《火炬手》延续了“山丹丹”组合+“名嘴”思路，刘流成了揭晓白云、黑土谁是奥运火炬手的主持人。
（中华传媒网）

description.hltext_display: Mitchell senior setter takes Daily Republic player of the year award
description.content:
Mitchell setter Charlee Nelson has molded a group of young hitters into a feared arsenal. In her second year running the Mitchell volleyball team’s offense, Nelson became known as “the best setter” in the state of South Dakota among many Class AA coaches, Mitchell coach Deb Thill said.
(Luke Hagen/Republic) Mitchell setter Charlee Nelson tosses a set during a match earlier this season at the Mitchell High School gymnasium. Nelson has been named The Daily Republic’s volleyball player of the year.
Mitchell setter Charlee Nelson has molded a group of young hitters into a feared arsenal.
In her second year running the Mitchell volleyball team’s offense, Nelson became known as “the best setter” in the state of South Dakota among many Class AA coaches, Mitchell coach Deb Thill said.
She set a school-record 63 assists in one match, racked up the second-most assists in a single season in school history and brought Mitchell to the state tournament for the first time since 2004.
For those reasons and more, Nelson has been named The Daily Republic’s volleyball player of the year.
“She’s a smart player and she makes good decisions,” Thill said. “She’s got very good leadership skills. Setters have a hard job, because she has to tell players what to do.”
Nelson was a unanimous first-place selection by The Daily Republic’s sports staff. She received 15 points in a system that awards five points for a first-place vote, four for a second, three for a third, two for a fourth and one for a fifth.
Wagner’s Devon Brecke finished second in the voting with 11 points, Mitchell junior Dana Misiaszek finished third with nine points and Platte-Geddes senior Emily Johnson finished fourth with six points. Mount Vernon’s Chandra Koch received three points, finishing fifth.
But it was the way Nelson helped transform Mitchell’s team that set her apart from the others.
In Nelson’s junior season, the Kernels finished the season 5-17 and got knocked from the playoffs in the first two rounds. As a senior, Mitchell went 14-12 and earned a trip to state.
“We didn’t make it for six years, and at the end of the season, it was one of my goals to get us out of that drought,” Nelson said. “Everyone expected us to be a so-so team, not a good team where we could make it to state.”
Nelson and the Kernels defeated Rapid City Central in straight sets in a regional play-in game to earn their ticket to state. It was a night where Mitchell’s offense was nearly unstoppable.
She had 28 assists and five kills in the three-set win. Her underclassmen teammate hitters — Kerri Young, Misiaszek, Lexie Weier and Taylin Alm — combined for 28 kills. It was the last match Nelson and the Kernels won during the year.
Despite going winless at state, Thill said Nelson should be proud of the turnaround she helped structure.
“When you look at where she was when she came in as a freshman, to where she ended and where she helped the team’s progress, that’s really something,” the 20-year head coach said.
Nelson finished the season with 841 assists and set a school record with 63 in a match. On Oct. 15, the Kernels were beaten by Central in five sets, but Nelson and the team’s offense was rolling.
“Our offense wasn’t a problem that night,” Thill said. “There were plenty of opportunities for Charlee because of how the match was flowing. It was a lot of side-out volleyball.
“We knew she had to have a high number, because Dana had 20 kills, Kerri had 17 and Lexie had 15. We knew there would be a high number of assists because of the way the offense was going.”
Nelson was named first-team Class AA all-state and is a finalist for the Miss Volleyball Award, which is given by the South Dakota Volleyball Coaches Association and will be announced in January.
In her career, she amassed 1,505 assists, 142 kills, 91 aces and 411 digs. She also served at a 93 percent accuracy rate. She became the seventh Mitchell setter to be named to the all-state list.
“I grew to love it,” said Nelson, who was switched from a hitter to a setter midway through her seventh-grade season. “It’s something I’m good at and I like to be in charge.”
In 20 years at Mitchell High, Thill has had three different setter coaches on her staff, including Tricia Neugebauer, Darin Weber and Beth Kopfmann. Thill said she attributes much of Mitchell’s strong setter play to her assistant setter coaches.
“When we break out different sessions in practice, our setters go with a different coach,” Thill said. “I have people who are knowledgeable enough about setting on my staff to help out our setters a lot.”
Many of Mitchell’s setters have gone on to play collegiate volleyball, like Nelson will next year. She said she’s narrowed her choices to the University of Sioux Falls and Dakota Wesleyan, but hasn’t made a final decision.
Whether she chooses Sioux Falls or DWU, Nelson will be close enough to be able to watch the Kernels next season, a year where the team’s offense will be in the hands of a new setter.
“I was really close to my teammates and coach Thill, so it’ll be tough,” Nelson said. “I’m proud of my team and what we were able to accomplish this year. I know they’ll be able to carry that on to next year.”
Here’s a capsule look at the other players who received votes:
n Wagner’s Devon Brecke, a junior, led her team to third place in the Class A state tournament. She was named to the first-team Class A all-state team and had 353 kills, 46 aces, 24 locks and 312 digs last year.
n Junior Dana Misiaszek, Mitchell, had 238 kills with a 26.2 kill percentage. Along with Nelson, she helped Mitchell get to the state tournament for the first time since 2004. She was also a first-team all-Eastern South Dakota Conference member.
n Platte-Geddes senior Emily Johnson had 351 kills, 42 blocks, 28 aces and 246 digs to help her team take the consolation championship in the Class A state tournament.
n Chandra Koch, a senior at Mount Vernon, was named to the second-team Class B all-state list. She had 360 kills, 110 digs, 52 blocks and 31 aces in her senior season.
“When you look at where she was when she came in as a freshman, to where she ended and where she helped the team’s progress, that’s really something,” the 20-year head coach said.
Nelson finished the season with 841 assists and set a school record with 63 in a match. On Oct. 15, the Kernels were beaten by Central in five sets, but Nelson and the team’s offense was rolling.
“Our offense wasn’t a problem that night,” Thill said. “There were plenty of opportunities for Charlee because of how the match was flowing. It was a lot of side-out volleyball.
“We knew she had to have a high number, because Dana had 20 kills, Kerri had 17 and Lexie had 15. We knew there would be a high number of assists because of the way the offense was going.”
Nelson was named first-team Class AA all-state and is a finalist for the Miss Volleyball Award, which is given by the South Dakota Volleyball Coaches Association and will be announced in January.
In her career, she amassed 1,505 assists, 142 kills, 91 aces and 411 digs. She also served at a 93 percent accuracy rate. She became the seventh Mitchell setter to be named to the all-state list.
“I grew to love it,” said Nelson, who was switched from a hitter to a setter midway through her seventh-grade season. “It’s something I’m good at and I like to be in charge.”

“When we break out different sessions in practice, our setters go with a different coach,” Thill said. “I have people who are knowledgeable enough about setting on my staff to help out our setters a lot.”

Here’s a capsule look at the other players who received votes:
- Wagner’s Devon Brecke, a junior, led her team to third place in the Class A state tournament. She was named to the first-team Class A all-state team and had 353 kills, 46 aces, 24 locks and 312 digs last year.
- Junior Dana Misiaszek, Mitchell, had 238 kills with a 26.2 kill percentage. Along with Nelson, she helped Mitchell get to the state tournament for the first time since 2004. She was also a first-team all-Eastern South Dakota Conference member.
- Platte-Geddes senior Emily Johnson had 351 kills, 42 blocks, 28 aces and 246 digs to help her team take the consolation championship in the Class A state tournament.
- Chandra Koch, a senior at Mount Vernon, was named to the second-team Class B all-state list. She had 360 kills, 110 digs, 52 blocks and 31 aces in her senior season.
Past winners
Winners of The Daily Republic’s annual volleyball player of the year award:
2001-Marcy Jacobsen, Mitchell
2002-Chelaine Knudsen, Andes Central
2002-Chelsey Miller, Mitchell
Note: 2002 season switch
2003-Katrina Brooks, Andes Central
2004-Gina Baldwin, Mitchell
2005-Kelli Fiegen, Parkston
2006-Jena Doom, Wagner
2007-Kelli Fiegen, Parkston
2008-Keaya Weber, Wagner
2009-Jilanne Doom, Wagner
2010-Charlee Nelson, Mitchell

description.hltext_display: Toyota Launches Redesigned 'Vitz'; Models with Idling-stop Boast Fuel Efficiency of 26.5 km/L
description.content:
- (JCN Newswire) - Toyota Motor Corporation (TMC) announces the launch in Japan today of the redesigned "Vitz" compact car.
Since the launch of the first-generation in 1999, the Vitz has achieved cumulative sales in more than 70 countries and regions around the world - including many European countries - exceeding 3.5 million units(1). With more than 1.4 million of those units(2) having been sold in Japan, the Vitz is truly a core model of the Toyota brand.
The new, third-generation Vitz, developed based on a new definition of the ideal compact car to meet consumers' diversifying compact-car needs, features sharper styling as well as a compact exterior but roomy, refined interior; abundant utility; and outstanding fuel efficiency of 26.5 km/L - made possible by the Toyota Stop & Start idling-stop system - in the 10-15 test cycle of the Japanese Ministry of Land, Infrastructure, Transport and Tourism (MLIT). The result is a distinctive compact car that achieves performance equivalent to a vehicle one class higher in terms of quality, comfort, ease of use and affordability.
With four grades that emphasize unique individuality, 17 body colors and four interior colors available, the Vitz is a highly appealing next-generation compact that enhances the enjoyment of choosing the perfect car and the pride of ownership.
Vehicle Outline
I. Exterior symbolizes innovation united with a high-quality interior
The exterior has been completely redesigned under the key design concept words of agility and sophistication. The result is a dynamism conveying the car's brisk and responsive handling as well as a sophistication expressing compact-car elegance and presence.
The exterior design achieves high aerodynamic performance (coefficient drag value of 0.285), contributing to high fuel efficiency and stable high-speed cruising.
The interior strives to create a form both sporty and comfortable. For example, padding that extends horizontally from the instrument panel to the door trim conveys roominess and creates a sophisticated feel.
II. New package provides both easy driving and a roomy interior
The compact length, just 3,885 mm, enables a turning radius of 4.5 m.
The interior length has been extended by 35 mm to 1,915 mm, creating a roomier space.
The front seats use a new frame that enhances seating comfort, and the rear seats have 35 mm more legroom to create a comfortable and relaxing space in the rear.
The rear seats fold in a 6:4 split, enabling flexible arrangement.
The vertical adjustment range of the driver's seat is now 60 mm (15 mm more than the previous model) and the seat slide adjustment range is 10 mm with 24 steps (8 steps more than the previous model), allowing the driver to achieve an optimal driving position.
III. Utility and enhanced performance ideal for a range of driving situations
The cargo space has been made 145 mm deeper, providing ample storage capacity. Also, a new adjustable deck board can be set at two heights: When set in the upper position small objects can be placed below, and folding down the rear seats can create an almost-flat luggage space.
A discreet sub compartment for storing the owner's manual is located at the top of the glove compartment, expanding storage space.
The passenger seat has a special plastic barrier that can be used to prevent handbags or other items from falling forward off the seat. Shopping bags and such can be hooked to the top of the barrier, which can also be used to keep an umbrella in place.
The new Vitz is the first vehicle in the world to use UV-reducing glass in the front-door glass that reduces 99%(3) of ultraviolet light, providing the same level of UV protection as wearing gloves(4).
The single windshield wiper works with an integrated washer nozzle that improves wiping performance.
The headlights automatically turn on and off according to exterior brightness.
The new Vitz is equipped with a color, rearview monitor that enhances visibility when parking, as well as an HDD navigation system that incorporates steering-wheel-mounted audio-system-control switches.
IV. Comfortable cruising, due consideration to safety and the environment
The Smart Stop package, featuring a new idling-stop function, mounts a 1.3-liter engine on a two-wheel drive model to achieve class-leading(5) fuel efficiency of 26.5 km/L. The engine restarts in just 0.35 seconds to ensure smooth and immediate acceleration from a stop.
The 1.3-liter models are now equipped with a 1NR-FE engine with Dual VVT-i (Dual Variable Valve Timing-intelligent). Pairing with a Super CVT-i (Super Continuously Variable Transmission-intelligent) transmission achieves outstanding fuel efficiency of 24.0 km/L (two-wheel drive models) and powerful cruising. The four-wheel drive models are also equipped with Super CVT-i for smooth cruising and higher fuel efficiency.
The front-wheel-drive models (with CVT) surpass the existing Japanese 2010 fuel efficiency standards by 25% and the four-wheel-drive models surpass the standards by 15%. All models in the series achieve emission levels 75% lower than the 2005 standards under MLIT's Approval System for Low-emission Vehicles, qualifying for incentives under the Japanese government's taxation system for environment friendly vehicles. As a result, the front-wheel-drive models (with CVT) qualify for a 75% reduction in the automobile acquisition tax and automobile weight tax, while the four-wheel-drive models qualify for 50% reductions.
A multi-information display located within the instrument cluster shows information including fuel efficiency, average fuel efficiency and possible cruising distance. Further, an Eco Driving Indicator that turns on when the accelerator is operated in an environmentally friendly manner supports eco-driving.
EBD (electronic brake-force distribution) and ABS are standard on all models.
The Vitz features an omni-directional compatibility structure to provide outstanding collision safety performance in the event of a collision from the front, side or rear.
All vehicles come equipped with SRS airbags for both the driver and front-passenger seats. SRS side airbags also provide chest protection, while SRS curtain-shield airbags aim to reduce head injuries.
The WIL (Whiplash-injury Lessening) concept has been adopted for the front seats, adding backrest-give and head and back support for more protection in the event of a rear-end collision.
A pedestrian-injury-lessening body has been adopted to minimize impact to the head and legs of pedestrians in the unfortunate event of a collision.
V. Four grades emphasize individuality and boost the joy of selection
The new and distinctive Jewela grade features exclusive body and interior colors and interior and exterior ornamentation with a plated finish to convey vibrancy. The Jewela also offers a selectable sophisticated silver-finish for the door mirrors and door handles.
The F grade has specifications designed to meet a wide range of needs including price, fuel efficiency, and comfort.
On the U grade, a leather-covered steering wheel and shift knob and heated seats that warm the shoulders and back are standard equipment to enhance comfort and sophistication.
The sporty RS grade has exclusive designs on the front and rear, including the bumpers and a roof spoiler. Various other equipment, including exclusive sports car style seats, a steering wheel wrapped in leather with dimple stitching, and a fun-to-drive five-speed manual transmission or seven-speed Sports Sequential Shiftmatic transmission with a paddle shift-type shift lever that provides manual-transmission feel.
VI. Welcabs: Vehicles with factory-installed features for the disabled
The Lift-up Front Passenger Seat model is equipped with a front passenger seat that rotates and slides down and to the outside of the vehicle. The B type comes with a motorized device for loading and unloading a wheelchair as standard equipment.
A Welcab Friendmatic model allowing for the installation of a specialized driver's seat and devices is also available. This vehicle has special power steering as a standard feature that reduces the force needed for operation compared to the base vehicle, making the steering wheel easier to turn during initial acceleration and low-speed driving.
Monthly sales target for Japan: 10,000 units
Assembly Plant: Nagakusa Plant, Toyota Industries Corporation
Additional details and specifications: http://www2.toyota.co.jp/en/news/10/12/1222.html
About Toyota
Supported by people around the world, Toyota Motor Corporation (TSE: 7203; NYSE: TM), has endeavored since its establishment in 1937 to serve society by creating better products. As of the end of March 2010, Toyota conducts its business worldwide with 51 overseas manufacturing companies in 26 countries and regions. Toyota's vehicles are sold in more than 170 countries and regions. For more information, please visit www.toyota.co.jp/en/index.html.
Source: Toyota
Contact:
Toyota Motor Corporation Corporate Communications Department Public Affairs Division Tel: +81-3-3817-9150

description.hltext_display: 《龙之谷》X2今日翻倍上映
description.author: zolgame
description.content:
《龙之谷》年度特别版“龙之谷X2”今日翻倍上映，为所有谷迷带来快乐X2的游戏体验。天启巢穴引爆挑战激情；潜力系统提升装备属性；新增低等级黑暗神殿开放六种玩法模式，闯关乐趣多多。为了保卫女神像而战，放佛又置身于古希腊的圣域，追寻圣斗士们曾经战斗过的痕迹。还有唯美圣诞场景，雪花漫舞、欢快的音乐在阿尔特里亚大陆上空飘扬。一个最特别最浪漫的《龙之谷》即将全景呈现。
今日火爆新增圣诞新服：
华东电信七区：6服-天启之光 年度特别版客户端下载 http://dn.sdo.com/web7/down/game.asp 年度特别版精彩内容 http://act.dn.sdo.com/101222banben/index.html 圣诞套装 有型又有爱 http://act.dn.sdo.com/2010christmas/index.html
年度特别版中新增趣味圣诞特别任务。捕猎关卡中随机出现老朋友“疯鸭”，协助艾琳搜集松果、铃铛、白雪等装饰最美的圣诞树，可以赢取爆竹、雪球。在游戏里为好友或者NPC送上圣诞卡片，还会收到艾琳送来的神秘礼包，因为小妮子最欣赏团结有爱的伙伴啦。圣诞节当晚还有圣诞Party，经验加成、300点活动疲劳值发放。同时“纪念爱情”、“新年强化步步高”、“区服凝聚力大赛”等趣味活动陪你度过一年中最浪漫的节日。 圣诞特别任务 欢乐翻倍 http://act.dn.sdo.com/101222huodong/index.html
为欢迎更多的新朋友共同踏上自由冒险之旅，今日还将增开新服“天启之光”，除了九大圣诞活动外，新服玩家还有专享的新服活动，快速升级。同时跨区PVP大赛也在火热进行中，为全区所有PVP高手提供同台竞技的英雄会。 新服专项活动 助你快速升级 http://dn.sdo.com/web7/news/newsContent.asp?ID=73674&CategoryID=104 年度特别版全新内容 特别的爱给特别的你
【挑战激情x 2=天启巢穴】
作为年度特别版领军魔物，“审判者天启”科幻位十足。一艘在穿越时空的过程中遭受意外而变异的飞船，变身为战斗力恐怖的机械怪兽——天启。外星邪恶生命体将面临神奇四侠们的绝地反击。时空穿梭的强力科幻巢穴背后又是怎样一个巨大的谜团呢？
勇士们必须先开启六个封印才能见到天启真身。而守护封印的各个BOSS就不容小觑。有真假难辨的“五兄弟的亡灵”，五个暗夜死灵中只有一个是真身，如果无法消灭真正的头目，假头目可是会复活的哦。骄傲的莱班特，和他的爪牙豺狼人枪手们，冷酷的让子弹飞……。还有更多各具特色的BOSS们，大家一定要打起精神哦。
【装备属性x 2=潜力系统】
九死一生通过天启巢穴的洗礼后，你将有概率获得让你的宝贝装备更加给力的潜力代码。将潜力代码注入对应装备，将赋予装备全新的潜力属性，让你精心收集与打造的装备在战斗中属性提升！
龙之谷X2之潜力系统 激发装备无穷能量 dn.sdo.com/web7/news/newsContent.asp?ID=73356&CategoryID=102 【浪漫气息x 2= 圣诞场景+圣诞套装】
随着圣诞节的临近，阿尔特里亚大陆的村民们也开始将村落用圣诞元素装扮起来。彩灯、花束、彩球、飘雪、堆成小山的圣诞礼物。作为阿尔特里亚的帅气迷人的勇士们终于可以穿上充满圣诞风味的洋装，和你的好友、公会同仁们在这里一起度过一个浪漫的圣诞季。圣诞，我们约会吧。
【热血PK x2 = 跨区PVP】
飘雪的冬天，再没有什么比一场热血沸腾、心跳加速的PK更能驱走寒意了。龙之谷国服首开跨区PVP服务器，试运营阶段将对部分玩家开放跨区PK服务。奥义、流派、装备……
PK爱好者们将在圣诞节聚首跨区PVP服务器，用自己的方式追寻最快乐的圣诞。 龙之谷首开跨区PVP http://dn.sdo.com/web7/news/newsContent.asp?ID=73120&CategoryID=102 【圣诞送礼x 2= 疯鸭送礼】
《龙之谷》闹腾专业户疯鸭童鞋也决定加入到这次圣诞庆典中。为了响应村民的号召，疯鸭也换上搞笑的圣诞装扮。疯鸭带来的不光是欢乐，更有圣诞大礼x2，也许，在阿尔特里亚大陆上，圣诞老人的麋鹿换成了疯鸭，是不是很给力呢？
今年圣诞玩什么能让快乐x2？
龙之谷年度特别版 “龙之谷X2”今日翻倍上映 http://act.dn.sdo.com/101222banben/ 下载最新客户端 http://dn.sdo.com 新手入门，一分钟菜鸟变高手 http://dn.sdo.com/web7/intro/guide1.asp?Part=NewGuid2|xsrm&ID=32720 进入官方论坛参与热烈讨论 http://bbs.dn.sdo.com 更多信息敬请关注《龙之谷》官方网站 http://dn.sdo.com

description.hltext_display: 崔永元炮轰收视率调查不真实
description.content:
来源：新民晚报┊2233字节┊阅读：42次┊2010-12-22
昨天下午，央视名嘴崔永元做客SMG电视新闻中心嘉宾论坛，他讲述的话题是《今天，我们还能怎样做电视》，其中，他对目前我国荧屏收视率的弊病进行了严厉抨击，对我国缺乏“口述历史”的紧迫性进行大声疾呼……
央视缺乏资质保证
崔永元说，今天还能怎么做电视？刚才，他一进电视台就看到了一个收视率高的节目获奖榜，而在电视台，收视率低的人连饭碗也保不住。他认为，我们并不是不要收视率，而是需要有科学、准确的收视率。按照国际惯例，收视率应该由独立的第三方来提供，没有任何亲缘关系，这样数据才能客观公正。而目前我国提供收视率的仅央视索福瑞一家。显然，央视是不能办收视率调查公司的，既没有资格，也没法保证公平。
崔永元指出，另外，从统计学角度来讲，超过正负5的数据就只能作为参考。而现在，央视索福瑞提供的数据是正负70，基本可以直接扔掉。但就是这样的收视率现在仍在影响着我们的电视，影响着电视人的制作。他建议大家去看看日本的收视率调查，日本人口、土地那么小，它的数据样板户是12500个，而央视索福瑞的数据样板户只有6000个。若按照日本的比例，我们至少需要有12.5万个样本户，这样才能达到正负5之内。因此，我们不要被这样的收视率束缚手脚，因为这个调查不真实。
“口述历史”错过太多
接着，崔永元对“口述历史”的重要性进行演说。他说，前不久，他因坚持做“口述历史”而被评为“2010年时尚先生”。至今，他率领的“口述历史”团队八年来已采访了3500个人，收集的口述历史影像素材已超过了10万多小时。他想建立一个《口述历史》库，给我们的民族留下一些记忆。他说，当时他采访八百壮士时，还有三人健在，但到了前天，最后一个老人也已去世。淞沪战役的四行仓库，如今已经没有亲历者了。
崔永元说，“口述历史”可以给民族带来记忆与理性，可以一辈一辈往下传。于丹说的《论语》我们都爱听，但有一个问题，《论语》是300年后孔子弟子整理出来的，是口口相传的，中间不知道拐了多少个弯。如唐诗宋词，为何有些诗圣的诗词不押韵，是否当时的发音与今天不一样？如今都是猜测。如果有了“口述历史”就能供后人研究，但我们错过了太多的机会。如梅兰芳、周信芳甚至季羡林等，都没有做“口述历史”。说相声的侯跃文还来不及做就走了。
他说，“口述历史”在美国已经做到了社区，在英国，已经做到了佣人。在南非有个“人民记忆中心”，所有人都是历史记忆的一环。而在整个中国，“口述历史”的资料甚至还抵不上日本、美国的一个大学。我们还有多少历史没有搞清楚，我们又能搞清楚多少？崔永元以哥伦比亚大学的唐德刚先生为例，他先后采访胡适、张学良、李宗仁等5人，每人采访都是100多次。而我们对历史文化太淡漠，都习惯于急功近利，捞一把就走。
（中华传媒网）

description.hltext_display: Defence inquiry finds export breach
description.content:
A sample of Australian Defence Force camouflage fabric was shipped to China without proper approval.
A defence investigation has found approval for export of the fabric sample would have been granted had it been sought.
However, the case has now been referred to the Australian Customs and Border Protection Service for possible further action under Australian export laws.
The defence investigation report was released on Wednesday with key details deleted, including the name of the company responsible.
At issue was whether Australian-developed camouflage fabric specially treated to minimise visibility to night-vision equipment was controlled under Australian defence export regulations.
The inquiry conducted by Colonel Terry McCullagh concluded it was and that a two-metre sample of this fabric had been exported to China without permission in 2008.
But he concluded this was no major breach of security.That's because this technology is widely available. China produces its own comparable fabric for military uniforms and even manufactures combat uniforms for the British army.
In the case of the Australian disruptive pattern camouflage uniform (DPCU) fabric, the key technical details were first published in 1995 with further details released in 2004.
"There is negligible risk that any export of NIR (near infra-red) treated fabric from Australia would contribute to proliferation of military technology," Colonel McCullagh said in the report.
This problem came about as defence moved to tender for supply of combat uniforms over five years in a deal worth some $128 million.
Because of size and complexity and the risk of delay, the Defence Materiel Organisation (DMO) released an interim request for tender for supply of 120,000 combat uniforms over two years at a cost of $13.6 million.
That went to the two last used suppliers of combat uniforms. In December 2009, DMO entered a contract with one firm which included an option for supply of fabric from China in the second year.
It was subsequently alleged the winning company had contravened defence export controls by exporting samples of fabric and the specifications to a Chinese textiles company.
The Australian company subsequently admitted sending the Chinese firm fabric specifications plus a two-metre fabric sample.
It said it did that without knowledge that export controls might be contravened.

event_or_fact.property: There is negligible risk that any export of NIR (near infra-red) treated fabric from Australia would contribute to proliferation of military technology

entity.property: Australian Customs and Border Protection Service

description.hltext_display: 煤泥烘干机垫板机座划线工作流程
description.content:
[原创] 关键部位安装操作规程煤泥烘干机。对基础设施进行验收，
(1)安装工艺方法煤泥烘干机。清除包装时涂饰的保护涂层以及粉尘、油污、锈蚀等情况。调整试运转等各项工作顺序和内容，纵横轴线误差小于20mm，吊装作业中的指挥，对作业现场、电器线路、管道等可能发生事故的隐患及防范措施等煤泥烘干机，必须采取的安全措施，制定零部件清洗、检测、运输起重就位、装配检测煤泥烘干机；对设备进行验收对照设备的装箱单。出料端允许不允许正煤泥烘干机，
沙子烘干机；检查有无错发缺件、变形损坏等情况。对零件、部件、标准件、随机文件等进行清点煤泥烘干机，制定装配作业中沙子烘干机；以避免安装工作中的返工煤泥烘干机:对零部件、关键配合件。编写具体检测安装方法、质量要求、技术标准、偏差范围、所需工具量具等事项
做好上述准备工作后煤泥烘干煤泥烘干机厂家欧诺机械解决煤泥烘干机维护中的难题
(2)对于基础尺寸与位置偏差应符合下列要求：外形尺寸与基础坐标位置，全长小于10mm，并作记录煤泥烘干机。无钢筋裸露、无裂纹缺角、预期留孔内无残留壳子板，以及其它浇注缺陷煤泥烘干机，进行预检测和预装配煤泥烘干机,斜度误差全长小于20mm煤泥烘干机
(1)基本安装程序沙子烘干机,特殊注意事项等煤泥烘干机；对重要零部件或关键部位煤泥烘干机,为避免可能发生的事故；上平面不平面度小于5mm/m煤泥烘干机；无油污、灰尘、杂物，不同平面标高误差小于20mm、只允许负不允许正。以便在安装前采购或制备沙子烘干机，这个过程主要是检查基础混凝土浇注的质量与尺寸、位置的偏差煤泥烘干机，才能按照安装程序和工艺进行具体安装，保证安装进度及安装质量煤泥烘干机。检查修整在运输装卸过程中所造成的损坏变形煤泥烘干机。
(2)安全技术要求煤泥烘干机:
(3)外观上要求基础表面干净煤泥烘干机。

description.hltext_display: 赛维欲寻台企代工光伏电池 或难有结
description.content:
ez25&``R[^$Wg
目前，赛维LDK在台湾积极寻找太阳能电池代工伙伴，公司正与新日光等台湾光伏企业协商。但是，新日光等台企态度谨慎，不愿对此作出回应。t=L9E-|Dkak]k
^+h{Ai]xNll;W~QUK|h
中投顾问新能源行业研究员萧函认为，赛维让其它光伏企业代工光伏电池，有利于加快公司硅片的出货速度。目前，赛维对外销售的产品仅限于硅片，且公司硅片产能居全国前列。国内其它硅片生产商供应能力的增强使赛维面临越来越大的销售压力。如果公司进入光伏电池生产环节，将消化公司生产的部分硅片。由于太阳能电池生产线从建造到顺利投产需要一年以上的时间，赛维如果自建电池生产线，并不能立即缓解公司硅片的销售压力，所以赛维决定让其它光伏企业代工光伏电池。{2XAIc?Y8)_|aSwY
&]u3:U Rt/%;,uA
赛维LDK之所以选择台湾光伏企业，主要是因为台企有着成熟的光伏电池代工经验。中投顾问发布的《2010-2015年中国太阳能电池业投资分析及前景预测报告》指出，在代工光伏电池方面，台湾光伏企业有着一定的技术沉淀，其生产的产品质量有保证。日本诸多著名光伏厂商(夏普、三洋等)均与台企建立了代工关系。wkjv&0zAuR]sDU4
%?|^5.c3-zs?Uf
萧函指出，赛维欲与新日光等台湾光伏企业建立代工伙伴关系，成功率不高。一方面，台湾光伏企业在市场开拓方面成效显著。之前台企为日本光伏厂商代工光伏电池，主要是想借此进入日本市场。如今，台企不仅打入了日本市场，在其它地区的市场份额也逐步上升。鉴于此，部分台企已经缩小了光伏电池的代工比重。i2zm54 8Qm@L,:boRA
PF UJm!FoE 1GE
另一方面，与销售自有品牌产品相比，代工利润不高。由于有着良好的成本控制体系，台企生产自有品牌光伏电池能够获得可观的收益。而台企代工光伏电池，只能获得一定额度的代工费。在当前全球光伏市场景气度上升、台湾光伏企业接到大量订单的情况下，台企选择以生产自有品牌产品为主。He5DA^`M`uE?P}A0g

description.hltext_display: Lohan 'assault' worker dismissed
description.content:
A woman who accused actress Lindsay Lohan of attacking her has been sacked by the Betty Ford rehab centre.
Rehab centre spokesman Russ Patrick said the employee was dismissed for breaking patient confidentiality at the Palm Desert, California, clinic by giving interviews and "disclosing a privileged document".
He said Dawn Holland's interview was a breach of trust and the rehabilitation process.
"When patients come to the centre for treatment, they come to a safe place where their identity is protected, where anonymity is safeguarded," he said.
Mean Girls star Lindsay, 24, is being investigated by Riverside County sheriff's detectives for misdemeanour battery following a confrontation on December 12.
A police spokeswoman said deputies were called to the Betty Ford centre shortly after 1am after an altercation between Lindsay and Ms Holland.
Lindsay's lawyer said the actress called the police emergency number.
Neither Betty Ford nor sheriff's officials identified Ms Holland, but she appeared in an interview on celebrity website TMZ, claiming Lindsay and two other girls had sneaked out of the centre.
Ms Holland said she was trying to get Lindsay to submit to a breathalyser test when the actress became belligerent, pushed her and snatched a phone from her hand, straining her arm.
Riverside County sheriff's deputy Herlinda Valenzuela said Lindsay's case would be presented to prosecutors, who would decide whether she should be charged.

description.hltext_display: Konsum miljonsatsar i Västernorrland
description.author: Sofia Callius
description.content:
Det blir en helt ny Coop-butik i Kramfors och en utbyggd och uppfräschad butik i Härnösand. Kostnaden för dem blir 110 miljoner kronor.
I dag finns det en Coop-butik i Kramfors, men den kommer att utrymma spå sikt och den nya butiken som ska ligga ett par hundra meter därifrån får bättre parkeringsytor och blir mer lättillgänglig. Den gamla butiken ska istället bli en city-galleria och har köpts av Kramfors kommun.
Coop-butiken i Härnösand får en ansiktslyftning för 60 miljoner när butiken byggs om. Bland annat ska Posten flytta in i samma lokaler, uppger SVT mobil. av: Sofia Callius
Kommentarerna omfattas således inte av Dagens Handels utgivningsbevis.

description.hltext_display: Kronans Droghandel startar drive-in-apotek
description.author: Sofia Callius
description.content:
Kronas Droghandel hoppas få öppna ett drive-in-apotek i Sundsvall.
Om det blir verklighet av planerna så är det Birsta city utanför Sundsvall som får sig ett apotek där man kan stanna till med bilen och hämta de varor man behöver, utan att ens lämna förarsätet.
Det är det befintliga apoteket i Coop-huset i Birsta som kan komma att kompletteras med en drive in-avdelning. I ett brev till Sundsvalls kommun lämnar Kronas Droghandel en förfrågan om det finns en möjlighet att öppna ett drive-in-apotek i anslutning till det befintliga apoteket i Coop-huset i Birsta. Vad som blir utgången av önskemålet är inte klart ännu. av: Sofia Callius
Kommentarerna omfattas således inte av Dagens Handels utgivningsbevis.

description.hltext_display: Posten har bråda dagar
description.author: Sofia Callius
description.content:
Trots vädret skickar svenskarna paket fram och tillbaka inför julen som aldrig förr. Natten till tisdagen slog Posten rekord i antal hanterade paket för ett enda dygn.
Totalt hanterade Posten 331 000 paket under natten, vilket är nästan 40 000 fler paket än toppnoteringen förra året. Hittills i december har cirka 3,9 miljoner paket passerat genom Postens distributionssystem. Det är cirka 10 procent fler paket jämfört med samma period förra året.
– Många av Postens kunder finns inom detaljhandeln och decembers rekordhöga paketvolymer är ett tydligt tecken på en mycket stark julhandel i år, säger Anders Holm, chef för Posten Logistik i Sverige.
Bland orsakerna till de stora volymerna av paket uppger Posten både vara leveranser till landets alla butiker och en kraftig tillväxt av e-handeln. av: Sofia Callius
Kommentarerna omfattas således inte av Dagens Handels utgivningsbevis.

description.hltext_display: 长期安全运转，关键在于调整托轮
description.content:
2.1 煤泥烘干机调整托轮的目的
(1) 维护转筒干燥机轴线的直线性；
(2) 保持筒体沿轴向正常地往复窜动，从而使挡轮保持静止不转或作短时间的、受力甚微的运动；
(3) 使各挡轮、托轮较均匀地承担筒体载荷。
2.2 煤泥烘干机调整方法
(1)检查观察挡轮受力、转动及滚圈与托轮的相对位置是否处于中间 ( 对正 ) ；
(2)沙子烘干机调整方法根据筒体回转方向调整托轮的中心线，采取朝某一方向同时歪斜托轮，使其与筒体中心线形成微小的偏角，一般不大于 0°30′ ，以免加速托轮磨损变形。调整后，产生螺旋向上的推力，使其与筒体上下窜动力基本平衡，让筒体在相对稳定的位置上运转，也就是滚圈处于上、下挡轮间自由往复窜动。
(3) 石英砂烘干机具体调整步骤当筒体下移时，将图 2 中调节螺栓 2 拧紧几圈，螺栓就按退几圈，拧紧圈数与松退圈数相等，使所有托轮与筒体的偏斜角相同，共同产生向上的螺旋力否则相互抵消，影响筒体的正常运转，筒体将停止下移如果下移太多，滚圈与托轮不再归中。为使筒体尽快上移，可以在滚圈上粘一些锯末．增加摩擦力，迅速将筒体推上去。然后擦去锯末，浇一些稀的润滑油，这时筒体将缓慢上移，或基本维持平衡如果依然上移，则拧紧螺栓 1 ，松退螺栓 2 ，筒体停止上移 如果筒体又下移，则应将托轮上的润滑油攘掉，必要时重复前述步骤，直到不窜动为止。
推荐到鲜果： 转播到微博 查阅更多相关主题的帖子: 煤泥烘干机 沙子烘干机

《无限世界》精炼你好 精炼再见
description.author: zolgame
description.content:
——《无限世界》取消精炼系统
如果你经常玩现在流行的网络游戏，应该不会对“精炼系统”陌生。从商业角度讲，所有在游戏中应用了这种系统的运营商都应该对发明人说声“谢谢”，之后，似乎也应该对玩家们说声“抱歉”。
所谓“精炼系统”，简单说就是通过各种物品加强你的武器装备，什么追3加12，五六七八阶，看起来挺有粘着力的系统，没错，它确实很粘人，当然，也很粘钱。
如Logo所示，《无限世界》中拥有多个风格迥异的平行子世界，以回归游戏本源的“玩点”来代替诸如“精炼”这种“玩点”
首先，精炼装备所需的各种物品是大都需要现金购买，其实到这里也算合情合理，游戏都免费了，也得让人赚点钱对不对？精彩处在于另一个设定，当你花掉几百块甚至几千块购齐材料，战战兢兢点下“确定”按钮后，要是弹出个“成功”还好，如果弹出个失败，你会作何感想（用大脚趾想也能知道，失败概率是远远大于成功概率的）？沮丧？憎恨？无奈？对，这些都会有，但是接下来不是鼠标一摔大喊一声“什么破玩意，上当！”而是……继续购买。
老实说，精炼系统是一个愿打愿挨的系统，没人逼着玩家去花大把金钱购买虚拟物品，但是咱们人类都有个争强好胜，或者说虚荣之心，看着别人身披金甲，手握利器，哪个能不有点羡慕之情？再加上游戏本身的设计，很多时候不精练便不能对自身进行有效提高，所以虽然玩家大都知道精炼系统就是一个“吸金黑洞”，还是会一边骂一边义无反顾地砸钱进去。 那么“精炼系统”错了吗？并没有，无论从现有法律还是社会道德，怎么都不能说这个系统有“错误”，它简单、有效，直接让玩家得到结果，什么剧情、NPC、努力、运气，全都不重要，只要你愿意砸钱，就能得到你想要的。
不过，在趣游天际首款作品《无限世界》中，正式取消了“精炼系统”。
没错，取消了。
因为它不够“有趣”。
小丑将出现在《无限世界》中不少场景，他们与《无限世界》有一点想通：给大家带来乐趣
事情起始于《无限世界》官网上开设的时空虫洞。每天都有大量玩家往虫洞中投递建议，每一条都会直接递送到趣游天际的最高管理层眼前并获得回复，累积已经超过万余条。
经常会在虫洞的建议中见到对于“精炼系统”的非议，于是，总BOSS回复道，“好的，那么便把精炼系统取消了吧。”
“时空虫洞”是用来专门收集玩家建议的所在，每天都有大量玩家意见直接递往开发团队，进行肉眼可见的微改编
作为《无限世界》微改编计划的重要通道，“时空虫洞“在我们眼皮底下实实在在地改变着游戏。
至少，《无限世界》的玩家现在可以痛快地说上一句——精炼你好，精炼再见。
无限世界官网：http://www.51play.com
无限世界论坛：http://bbs.51play.com

description.hltext_display: No worries at Lingfield
description.content:
Wednesday afternoon's all-weather meeting at Lingfield has survived a 6.30am precautionary inspection and goes ahead as scheduled.
The forecast snow failed to materialise, and the track is raceable.
There was also no overnight frost.

description.hltext_display: 煤泥干燥机的升级后的不同之处
description.content:
[原创] 来看看大功率煤泥烘干机/煤泥干燥机的升级后的差异之处：
煤泥烘干机/煤泥干燥机主机革新一样平常要办理两个问题：
一是淘汰筒体散热煤泥烘干机。
二是煤泥烘干机，使烘干体系有稳固、适量的通风煤泥烘干机，综上所述煤泥烘干机,回转窑欧诺机械圆盘给料机除了煤泥烘干机/沙子烘干机筒体外貌热量散失多少是衡量烘干机节能与否的一个尺度外煤泥烘干机。二是提高热互换效率煤泥烘干机，对物料举行压抛洒、翻腾煤泥烘干机，我们也借鉴了三筒烘干机的特点沙子烘干机，要是准备长期做这个项目煤泥烘干机，不论是三筒烘干机．还是颠末革新的单筒烘干机煤泥烘干机，烘干装置还能起到蓄热作用煤泥烘干机。我们欧诺一样平常都不主张这种要领．我们有更好的淘汰热散失的要领煤泥烘干机。为淘汰煤泥烘干机/煤泥干燥机筒体热丧失煤泥烘干机，我们选择专用的煤泥烘干机/煤泥干燥机通风设备煤泥烘干机。欧诺机械煤泥烘干机/煤泥干燥机发起你利用节能方面的烘干设备煤泥烘干机，烘干斲丧的能量也会很大煤泥烘干机。提高热互换率煤泥烘干机，立室节能先辈的热风炉煤泥烘干机，这些步伐使传统的回转式烘干机产量提高1倍上面．煤的水分比力多煤泥烘干机，和物料之间可直接举行热互换煤泥烘干机，有厂家接纳外保温或内保温煤泥烘干机。因此热互换效率大大提高煤泥烘干机，优化煤泥烘干机/煤泥干燥机筒体内部布局煤泥烘干机，都有利弊．处理惩罚不妥乃至弊大于利煤泥烘干机，另一个紧张的指标是烘干机废气出口温度煤泥烘干机。在石英砂烘干机内部加装内筒共同加装组合型中间扬料装置煤泥烘干机，单筒卧式煤泥烘干机/煤泥干燥机在改革进程中煤泥烘干机。

description.hltext_display: Thunder pull away in fourth to beat Bobcats
description.content:
Kevin Durant led all scorers with 32 points and grabbed seven rebounds, as the Oklahoma City Thunder used a big fourth quarter to defeat the Charlotte Bobcats, 99-81.

description.hltext_display: 元旦送大礼 《大话2》推出超级变色丹
description.author: zolgame
description.content:
元旦是朋友家人欢聚团圆的时刻，也是大话2玩家忙着收获神兽、元气丹等好礼的日子。今年的大话2元旦大礼更令人惊奇，除了每年都有的神兽、神兵等大奖外，元旦活动还将首次投放“变色丹、”等高级奖励，喜欢变色宝宝的玩家有福了！
神兽，元气丹，变色丹，闪亮登场！
“四气新始，万象今朝”元旦活动中，大话2官方为玩家准备了丰富的大奖！
除了出现在大型节日活动中的神兽，还有只有在元旦节日才会投放，增加宝宝成长率的“元气丹”及“超级元气丹”。每年一次赢取元气丹的机会，一定不能错过！ 元旦神秘大礼浮出水面，大话2首次推出游戏物品：“变色丹”和“”，可以有几率让对应的宝宝变成拉风的变色宝宝。只在元旦任务中投放，千万不要错过哦！ 想让你的宝宝变成变色宝宝吗，不要错过大话2元旦任务！
好友同贺，神秘礼盒神秘大礼！
在元旦活动的三天，大话2玩家可以通过简单轻松的单人任务，获得道具“元夕佳福”，祝福游戏里相伴一年的好友，只有友好度高于100的好友才可以获得彼此的祝福哦。
“如意福盒送欢喜”每个玩家都可以轻松完成，叫上你的朋友一起来大话2吧，无论是送出祝福，还是接受祝福，都有机会获得充满祝福之气的三界福光，去元旦万福特使那里换取三种不同的神秘礼盒，礼盒里的秘密，会是一个大大的惊喜哦！
2011元旦任务首次开放新场景“圆丘方泽”。组队任务在这里完成，兑换奖励后再进入圆丘方泽，有可能碰到赭炎或者苍凛，捕捉将会有出乎意料的惊喜哦！ BOSS挑战，长安夜景，美不胜收！
元旦任务期间，长安城夜景首次开放，对大话2里的景色情有独钟的玩家，可尽情游览璀璨的长安夜景。 熙熙攘攘、柳暗花明的新长安已深入人心，夜色中的长安城又将是怎样的风情？灯火通明的长安夜色，在色彩斑斓的灯笼点缀下，映衬出长廊迤逦身影。
热闹的新年，在大话2里度过，约上你的好友同伴，一起来游戏吧！共话美好情谊，同游长安夜色，坐拥丰富奖励，不要错过哟！
《大话西游Ⅱ》是网易公司完全依靠国人力量自主开发和运作的精品RPG网络游戏，她以中国优秀浪漫主义古典小说《西游记》和香港着名系列电影《大话西游》为创作蓝本，为玩家展开了一个神怪与武侠交错，情感与大义并存的美丽世界。运营八年以来，受到无数玩家的喜爱和支持，目前注册人数超过1亿5千万，最高同时在线人数突破110万，成为中国网络游戏市场的经典之作。
大话西游Ⅱ官网：xy2.163.com
大话西游Ⅱ官方论坛：xy2.netease.com
